semantic_description: Add HTTP_REFERER and HTTP_RESPONSE_REDIRECT_LOCATION attributes to incoming HTTP request spans in the CLM web application to enable redirect flow tracing.

attributes_to_add.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_REDIRECT_LOCATION
attributes_to_add.value_source: HttpContext.Response.Headers["Location"] when status code is 301, 302, 303, 307, or 308
